markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs=""
>
[Bag of Devouring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=598)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Extradimensional" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=67" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 90</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This item appears to be and functions as a [_bag of holding_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=249), but is actually a feeding orifice of a bizarre extradimensional creature. Any animal or vegetable matter put in the bag has a chance of triggering the bag's interest. Whenever you reach into the bag to retrieve an item or place an animal (or plant or animal or plant product) within the bag, roll a DC 9 flat check. On a success, the bag ignores the intrusion. On a failure, the bag devours the triggering material, removing it from this realm of existence; the bag can't eat [artifacts](/equipment/artifacts) or other similarly hard-to-destroy items. If the triggering material is not entirely inside of the bag, such as when someone reaches a hand inside, the _bag of devouring_ attempts to pull it completely inside the bag using a [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) action, with an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) bonus determined by the type of bag. On a success, it devours the victim or object entirely.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs=""
>
Bag of Devouring Type I
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 90</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

**Athletics Bonus** +15; acts as a _type II bag of holding_

level="2"

pfs=""
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 90</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

<title
level="2"

pfs=""
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

**Athletics Bonus** +24; acts as a _type IV bag of holding_
name: Bag of Devouring Type II
